derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French médaillon, from Italian medaglione, augmentative of medaglia (see medal)

entry.tran: (尤指用链子挂于颈部的)圆形金属饰物
entry.def: A medallion is a round metal disc which some people wear as an ornament, especially on a chain round their neck.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various large ancient Greek coins
2. a circular helping of food (especially a boneless cut of meat);
3. an emblem indicating that a taxicab is registered
4. an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
